Package sg.dex.starfish

Interface DataAsset

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Asset
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileAsset, MemoryAsset, RemoteDataAsset, ResourceAsset, SquidAsset, URIAsset
    public interface DataAsset
extends Asset
    Interface representing a data asset.

    A data asset is any asset that can be represented as an immutable sequence of bytes. As such, data assets offer the following properties: - They can be validated with a hash of the byte content - The byte representation of the data can be obtained (subject to appropriate permissions)

    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Mike

    • Method Detail

      • isDataAsset

        default boolean isDataAsset()
        Description copied from interface: Asset
        Returns true if this asset is a data asset, i.e. the asset represents an immutable data object.
        Specified by:
        isDataAsset in interface Asset
        Returns:
        true if the asset is a data asset, false otherwise

      • getContentStream

        InputStream getContentStream()
        Gets an input stream that can be used to consume the content of this asset.

        Will throw an exception if consumption of the asset data in not possible locally.

        Specified by:
        getContentStream in interface Asset
        Returns:
        An input stream allowing consumption of the asset data
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - if requester does not have access permission
        StorageException - if unable to load the Asset

      • getContentSize

        long getContentSize()
        Gets the size of this data asset's content
        Returns:
        The size of the asset in bytes

      • validateContentHash

        default boolean validateContentHash()
        This method is to validate the hash of the asset content . it will calculate the hash of the content of an Asset then compare with the hash value included in metadata, if both are not the same , StarfishValidation Exception will be thrown
        Returns:
        boolean true if the content is valid else false
        Throws:
        StarfishValidationException - if hash content is not matched , exception will be thrown

      • getContentHash

        default String getContentHash()
        This method is used to calculate the hash of the content by using keccak256 hashing algorithm.
        Returns:
        the content of hash as string

      • includeContentHash

        default DataAsset includeContentHash()
        This method is to include the content of hash in the asset metadata. Hash of the content will be calculated based on sha3_256String hashing algo , and the hash content will be included in the asset metadata. This hash content will be used to validate the integrity of asset content Also this operation is only applicable if the Asset is of type DataAsset , if Asset is not DataAsset Unsupported Operation Exception will be thrown
        Returns:
        respective data asset sub class.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the Asset type is not DataAsset

      • updateMeta

        default DataAsset updateMeta​(String newMetaData)
        Get the new Data Asset based on metaData passed as n argument. This method will be implemented by the sub class
        Parameters:
        newMetaData - new meta data that will be used to create a Data Asset.
        Returns:
        the respective dataAsset based on sub-class
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if this operation is not supported by sub-class
